title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Superintendent's Compendium
body: Big Cypress Superintendent's Compendium          The superintendent's compendium (7.34 MB pdf) is a compilation of special designations, closures, public use limits, permit requirements, and other restrictions imposed under the discretionary authority of the superintendent, in addition to what is contained in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Chapter 1, Parts 1-7 and 34) (3.69 MB pdf), and other applicable federal statutes and regulations.
